source_objects.description: Develop the confidence and identity you need to be successful with high self esteem, self respect and positive self images.
source_objects.title: Self Esteem & Confidence

items.title: Natural & Deep-Rooted Self-Esteem: A Transformational Course
items.headline: Enough information! This is a real transformational experience, designed to reprogram your way into real self-esteem.
objectives_summary: What Are Confidence And Self-Esteem?
The symptoms of lacking confidence and self-esteem.
The causes of low confidence and self-esteem.

items.title: Reclaiming Your Positive Self-Esteem
items.headline: This course gives you powerful tools to destroy negative self-beliefs and enjoy life with a positive self-esteem.
objectives_summary: Participants will gain a new understanding of the origins of self-esteem.
You will see the connection between your negative self-beliefs and your negative prior experiences.
You will be able to identify and understand the ways the brain actually works to hold onto prior beliefs, even when they are inaccurate.

items.title: Self-Confidence Crash Course: How to Build Self-Confidence
items.headline: Learn How to Become Confident. Develop Self-Confidence. No More Playing a Role or Playing an Actor in Your Own Life.
objectives_summary: Increase Your Level of Confidence
Learn Powerful Strategies for Building Confidence
Learn Core Concepts That Will  Ensure Future Progress

items.title: How to overcome Shame, Embarrassment and Humiliation?
